views.markdown:
V1.992 Changelog - General compatibility updates V1.991 Changelog
- General compatibility updates
- Integration with Activator for Increment functionality


V1.99 Changelog
- Added compatibility with TuneShell


V1.98 Changelog
- Application compatibility updates
- Fictitious: This tweak is tired of being updated

V1.97 Changelog
- Wider compatibility with localized versions of Napster and compatibility with Rhapsody

V1.96 Changelog
- General compatibility updates and experimental compatibility for Movie Box
V1.95 Changelog
- Compatibility update for latest version of Netflix

V1.94 Changelog
- Added compatibility with Anytune
- Compatibility updates for latest versions of PocketCasts and Tidal
V1.93 Changelog

- Full support up to iOS 9.3.x
- Additional reminder to reboot when first installing
V1.92 Changelog

- The tweak 'Feedback' is now available free for users of Seeker. Try it out for a more refined experience.
- General compatibility updates
- Fictitious: This tweak votes in referendums
V1.91 Changelog

- Added compatibility with Napster
- Fictitious: This tweak excels at Quidditch
V1.9 Changelog

- Added long-press to half-increment functionality (more refined incremental seeking for those who need it, particularly for longer-duration tracks)

- Added compatibility with Pocket Casts

- Added compatibility with Spin and Phenomenon

- Fictitious: As a child this tweak's favourite game was hide-and-seek
V1.8 Changelog
- Compatibility update to support the latest version of Spotify

V1.7 Changelog (09/04/2016)

- Improved Increment Control placement on iPad
- Widened compatibility with other substrate extensions
- Updated app compatibility listing
- Fictitious: You can now immerse this tweak in liquid nitrogen for even faster seeking
V1.6 Changelog

- Added support for Netflix
V1.5 Changelog
- Support for latest version of Tidal

V1.4 Changelog

- Added support for iOS 9.1
- Added support for iBooks app
- Fixed Hardware Increments bug which prevented earpiece volume being changed during a call
1.3 Changelog
- Added compatibility with nPlayer
- Bug fixes for YouTube, should work just fine now.

1.2 Changelog
- Added compatibility with Deezer
- Improved support for Safari

1.1 Changelog
- Eliminated bug preventing correct Smart Preview operation when scrubbing backwards
- Added 'Supplant Music' feature
- Added 'Spaced Increments' accessibility feature for iPhone
- Added compatibility with YouTube
- Updated compatibility listing
- Removed reboot-on-install requirement
v1.0.1
Added reboot after install
